FuncDef: The reset capture-packet access information command clears information about obtained packet headers.
CLIs: reset capture-packet access information [ slot <slot-id> [ instance <instance-id> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID based on which information about obtained packet headers is to be cleared.
The value is a string case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies a instance ID based on which information about obtained packet headers is to be cleared.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 3.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If information about obtained packet headers is no longer useful, run the reset capture-packet access information command to clear the information before you obtain packet headers again.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
